update person
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
present_address = #{presentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
